purpose: The email announces two postdoctoral positions available at UCLouvain, Belgium, specifically for candidates with a Ph.D. in computer science who are currently outside Belgium. The positions are part of the RAINDROP project, focusing on edge/cloud computing, and offer competitive salaries and support. Candidates are encouraged to develop independent research projects aligned with their interests, and the application process is open until the positions are filled.
